p: Three of our narrative elements were binary, and we therefore used a Wilcoxon Rank-Sum test to test for an association between the presence of these elements and a change in citation frequency. The remaining three narrative elements were continuous variables with non-normal distributions (Shapiro-Wilk test; p < 0.001), and accordingly we used the nonparametric Spearmanâ€™s rho to test for correlations between these elements and citation frequency.
